lead_paragraph: Matee Ajavon scored 24 second-half points to help the United States defeat Brazil, 79-66, in Rio de Janeiro and win its first Pan American Games women’s basketball title since 1987. The United States took the lead for good with 8 minutes 43 seconds left in the last quarter.
